title: 求助！太折磨我了！hs_err_pid30812
author: 请叫我奶昔叔丶
txt_content:
好像是说java缺乏环境发生致命错误

具体不是很明白
我猜是AMD 我以前都可以玩 就是重装个系统就变成这样 我查时候说什么AMD64什么的

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content: 如果显卡是A卡开光影的话会出现这种报错，解决方法是回滚显卡驱动，当然要是显卡不是A卡，当我没说

replies.author: 请叫我奶昔叔丶
replies.txt_content:
标题: 求助！太折磨我了！hs_err_pid30812   真的太折磨我了！我不知道什么问题 只要装有MOD的客户端我都进不了 它都弹出hs_err_pid30812 数字经常变 我真的烦透了 一直弄不明白 超级想玩MC！就大神帮我 跪求了！很想玩MC了  #
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x0000000050f3934b, pid=30812, tid=29540
#
# JRE version: 7.0_25-b16
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (23.25-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [atio6axx.dll+0xd8934b]  DrvPresentBuffers+0xca9a0b
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
---------------  T H R E A D  ---------------
Current thread (0x000000000007d800):  JavaThread "Minecraft main thread" [_thread_in_native, id=29540, stack(0x0000000002650000,0x0000000002750000)]
siginfo: ExceptionCode=0xc0000005, reading address 0x0000000000000000

replies.txt_content:
显卡问题
有没有安装光影Mod？有没有尝试重装或回滚显驱？

replies.author: KUde
replies.txt_content:
请叫我奶昔叔丶 发表于 2015-4-6 12:01
没用的 我试过很多次了
java环境错误的话，重装下java。建议java6.
要么就是电脑组件不支持。或者启动jar的配合电脑组件被删除

replies.author: modpromulgator
replies.txt_content: 冲下Java 下符合你电脑的32位或64位就好 最好下新版本
